translated: Sutra on the Auspicious Signs of the Twelve Links of Dependent Origination, Scroll 1
Tripiá¹­aka Master from the Western Regions, Chao-san-ta-fu Shih-hung-lu
Shao-qing, Dharma-transmitting Great Master, subject Shi Hu, respectfully translated by imperial decree
Thus have I heard:
At one time the World-Honored One was sitting cross-legged in the great assembly.
At that time, the great assembly respectfully surrounded him, gazing up at the TathÄgata, and spoke a verse in front of the Buddha, saying:
I bow my head to the Buddha's ocean of virtues, the one with true and perfect knowledge,
Who expounds the Dharma of dependent origination in the past and future.
The false views and inverted suffering of the world are boundless,
May the Buddha proclaim it.
At that time, the assembly of countless hundreds of thousands of humans and gods said to the Buddha:
The great assembly now and in the future wishes to hear the profound Dharma. Please expound it.
At that time, the World-Honored One said to the great assembly:
Excellent, excellent!
You should listen attentively, and I will now explain it for you.
All good men!

If you wish to understand the auspicious and wondrous responses of the twelve links of dependent origination, namely from ignorance up to old age and death, the sequence of the turning, in the twelve months, each gives rise to auspicious omens, and there are differences.
Starting from the tenth month up to the ninth month, and from the first day up to the fifteenth, try the auspicious omens, happiness and sorrow, the matters are not one.
All good men, these twelve links, starting from the month of Pavasu:

The first day is ignorance, the second day is old age and death, the third day is the link of birth, the fourth day is the link of existence, the fifth day is the link of grasping, the sixth day is the link of craving, the seventh day is the link of sensation, the eighth day is the link of contact, the ninth day is the six sense bases, the tenth day is name and form, the eleventh day is the link of consciousness, and the twelfth day is the link of karmic formations.
Furthermore, from the month of Makha, the eleventh month:

On the first day, the link of action; on the second day, ignorance; on the third day, old age and death; on the fourth day, the link of birth; on the fifth day, the link of existence; on the sixth day, the link of grasping; on the seventh day, the link of craving; on the eighth day, the link of feeling; on the ninth day, the link of contact; on the tenth day, the six sense bases; on the eleventh day, name and form; on the twelfth day, the link of consciousness.
Furthermore, from the month of Parvaá¹‡a, the twelfth month:

On the first day, the link of consciousness; on the second day, the link of action; on the third day, ignorance; on the fourth day, old age and death; on the fifth day, the link of birth; on the sixth day, the link of existence; on the seventh day, the link of grasping; on the eighth day, the link of craving; on the ninth day, the link of feeling; on the tenth day, the link of contact; on the eleventh day, the six sense bases; on the twelfth day, name and form.
Furthermore, from the month of Jyeá¹£á¹­ha, the thirteenth month:

One day is for name-and-form, two days for consciousness, three days for karmic formations, four days for ignorance, five days for old age and death, six days for birth, seven days for existence, eight days for grasping, nine days for craving, ten days for feeling, eleven days for contact, and twelve days for the six sense bases.
Also, from the month of Visakha:

One day is for the six sense bases, two days for name-and-form, three days for consciousness, four days for karmic formations, five days for ignorance, six days for old age and death, seven days for birth, eight days for existence, nine days for grasping, ten days for craving, eleven days for feeling, and twelve days for contact.
Also, from the month of Ashadha:

One day for the contact link, two days for the six sense bases link, three days for the name-and-form link, four days for the consciousness link, five days for the karmic formations link, six days for the ignorance link, seven days for the old age and death link, eight days for the birth link, nine days for the existence link, ten days for the grasping link, eleven days for the craving link, and twelve days for the feeling link.
Also, from the Asadha month to the four months:

One day for the feeling link, two days for the contact link, three days for the six sense bases link, four days for the name-and-form link, five days for the consciousness link, six days for the karmic formations link, seven days for the ignorance link, eight days for the old age and death link, nine days for the birth link, ten days for the existence link, eleven days for the grasping link, and twelve days for the craving link.
Also, from the Åšravaá¹‡a month to the five months:

One day for the craving link, two days for the receiving link, three days for the contact link, four days for the six sense bases, five days for the name-and-form link, six days for the consciousness link, seven days for the karmic formations link, eight days for the ignorance link, nine days for old age and death, ten days for the birth link, eleven days for the existence link, and twelve days for the grasping link.
Also, from the month of Punarvasu:

One day for the grasping link, two days for the craving link, three days for the receiving link, four days for the contact link, five days for the six sense bases, six days for the name-and-form link, seven days for the consciousness link, eight days for the karmic formations link, nine days for the ignorance link, ten days for old age and death, eleven days for the birth link, and twelve days for the existence link.
Also, from the month of Ashadha:

One day is the link of existence, two days are the link of grasping, three days are the link of craving, four days are the link of feeling, five days are the link of contact, six days are the six sense bases, seven days are the link of name-and-form, eight days are the link of consciousness, nine days are the link of volitional formations, ten days are the link of ignorance, eleven days are old age and death, and twelve days are the link of birth.
Also, from the month of Kali-kaga-mavasya:

One day is the link of birth, two days are the link of existence, three days are the link of grasping, four days are the link of craving, five days are the link of feeling, six days are the link of contact, seven days are the six sense bases, eight days are the link of name-and-form, nine days are the link of consciousness, ten days are the link of volitional formations, eleven days are ignorance, and twelve days are old age and death.
Also, from the month of Margasirsha-shrisha-mavasya:

One day for old age and death, two days for the birth stage, three days for the existence stage, four days for the grasping stage, five days for the craving stage, six days for the feeling stage, seven days for the contact stage, eight days for the six sense bases, nine days for the name-and-form stage, ten days for the consciousness stage, eleven days for the karmic formation stage, and twelve days for the ignorance stage.
The thirteenth day of each month is also like the third day;
The fourteenth day of each month is the same as the fourth day;
The fifteenth day is also reasonable.
The commentary says:
The existence stage follows the flow, accumulating days against the current. The remaining days of the dark and bright months are explained in detail in the sutra.
At that time, the World-Honored One told the great assembly:
If there are people who carefully contemplate the twelve links, remember them without forgetting, and understand their worries and joys,
If the link of ignorance is born on this day, there will be difficulties on the ninth day, the ninth month, and the ninth year.
If not due to the end of life, there will be happiness, wealth, disharmony with family, no illness, much speech, and a lifespan of eighty-one years, ending on the day of the moving consciousness.
The day of the moving consciousness, if a child is born, on the eighth day, month, or year, there will be difficulties.

If not due to the end of life, one will attain great wealth and nobility, have only two siblings, have a long life with few illnesses, be virtuous and know the Dharma, have many friends, be skilled in crafts, and have a lifespan of eighty-eight years, ending on the day of the discriminating consciousness.
The day of the discriminating consciousness, if a child is born, on the fifth day, month, or year, there will be difficulties.
If not due to the end of life, one will be hunchbacked and courageous, always lacking wealth, be joyful to see, have a lifespan of sixty-four years, and end on the day of name and form.
The day of name and form, if a child is born, on the sixth day, month, or in the ninth or tenth year, there will be difficulties.

If not due to the end of life, one will have little illness but many enemies, have short-lived children, be poor and fearful, obtain wealth and nobility later, enjoy giving, live to eighty years old, and die in the six sense bases.
If born on the day of the six sense bases, on the fifth day, in the third or fourth month, in the eighth or tenth year, one will encounter calamities.
If not due to the end of life, one will hate and be jealous, be often ill, be poor and brave, enjoy stinginess and greed, live to sixty-four years old, and die on the day of contact.
If a child is born on the day of contact, on the second or fifth day, in the third or ninth month, in the ninth year there will be difficulties.

If not due to the end of life, one will always be sickly, be eloquent and know the Dharma, be a thief and have a self-view, have wealth and be jealous of beauty, live to sixty-four years old, and die on the day of sensation.
If a child is born on the day of sensation, on the second or tenth day, in the second or eighth month, in the eighth year there will be difficulties.ğŸ”½Here is the corrected and aligned text:

If not due to death, they will always be greatly respected, wealthy and noble, with two wives and abundant wealth, skilled in crafts and arts, and live to sixty years old, passing away on the day of love.
If a child is born on the day of love, on the ninth day, third and fifth months, there will be difficulties in the ninth year.

If not due to the end of life, they will be the foremost in wealth and nobility, have many children and grandchildren, few illnesses but many enemies, live to sixty-four years old, and pass away on the day of taking.
If born on the day of taking, within the ninth day, second, eighth and ninth months, there will be difficulties in the ninth year.

If not due to the end of life, they will be difficult to subdue due to arrogance, have violent and evil friends, accumulate many enemies, commit offenses out of wrongdoing, live to sixty-four years old, and pass away on the day of existence.
If born on the day of existence, up to the ninth day, second and eighth months, there will be difficulties in the ninth year.

If not due to the end of life, coveting others' wives and daughters, sleeping little, being of noble lineage, being in charge of the army, having a lifespan of sixty years, and dying on the day of the birth link.
The birth link of the son, on the fifth day, in the ninth month, in the ninth year, in the tenth year, there is difficulty.

If not due to the end of life, being wealthy and noble, having many illnesses, protecting the country and respecting virtue, having a lifespan of seventy years, and dying on the day of old age and death.
The day of birth of old age and death, on the second day, within the ninth month, in the ninth year, there is difficulty.

If not due to the end of life, being foolish and confused, greedy, hateful, and thieving, being intelligent and sharp by nature, having harmonious relatives, having many enemies, having a lifespan of sixty-four years, and dying on the day of the ignorance link, the above comparison and auspicious events are concluded.
At that time, the World-Honored One told the great assembly:
If there is someone who does not have a tomorrow's illness, it is a difficulty of the yakshas. They should be well protected, and the fifth night will be better.
If one falls ill on the day of activity, there will be difficulty on the third and seventh days, but one will recover by the second night.
If one falls ill on the day of consciousness, there will be difficulty on the fifth day, and one will recover by the seventh night.
If one falls ill on the day of name-and-form, there will be difficulty on the third and fifth days, and one's life will be uncertain on that night.
If one falls ill on the day of the six sense bases, there will be difficulty on the third and fourth days, and one will recover by the tenth night.
If one falls ill on the day of contact, there will be difficulty on the third day, and one will always suffer from a chronic illness if one recovers on the eighth day.
If one falls ill on the day of feeling, there will be difficulty on the fifth day, and one will suffer for ten months if one recovers on the ninth day.
If one falls ill on the day of craving, there will be difficulty on the eighth and tenth days, and one's life will be uncertain on the nineteenth day.
If one falls ill on the day of grasping, there will be difficulty on that day, and one will die on the tenth day.
If one falls ill on the day of existence, there will be difficulty on the third and ninth days, and one will always suffer without recovery.ğŸ”½Here is the corrected and aligned text:
If the day of birth is afflicted, there will be difficulty on the fifth day. If it arises on the eighth day, up to the twelfth day, there will be difficulty but it can be cured.
If the day of old age and death is afflicted, there will be difficulty on the third day and the seventh day. If it arises, it can be cured.
At that time the World-Honored One said to the great assembly:

If there are people who, when setting out on a journey, contemplate the twelve links, they should know the good and evil.ğŸ”½If it is a no-sun day, going east is peaceful, good, and quickly returns. Going south, there will be disputes but one will obtain what one seeks. Going west while traveling, one hears what is disagreeable. Going north, one hears agreeable and beloved sounds.

If the day of the link of activity arises, going east is peaceful, good, and returns without obstruction. Going south, one worries but returns peacefully and happily. Going west, one obtains abundant food and drink on the road. Going north, it is peaceful, good, and one returns peacefully and happily.

If one sets out on a journey to the east, the road will be difficult and bitter. If one goes south, one will return to one's original place. If one goes west, there will be disputes and losses. If one goes north, one will gain profit and return to one's original place.

If one sets out on a journey to the east, one will have auspicious wealth and nobility. If one goes south, everything will be accomplished. If one goes west, all wishes will be fulfilled. If one goes north, the journey will be difficult and bitter.

If one sets out on a journey to the east, one will gain financial profit. If one goes south, it will be auspicious and one will return as intended. If one goes west, one's wishes will be fulfilled and everything will be accomplished. If one goes north, one will obtain what one seeks.

If one sets out on a journey to the east, one's wealth will be lost. If one goes south, one will be at ease. If one goes west, there will be disputes and fear. If one goes north and returns quickly, one's financial profit will increase.

If the sun is in the east, there will be distress and fear. If one escapes in the past, when going south, there will be fear and disputes. When going west, one will suddenly hear and believe. When going north, one will gain profit as intended, and hearing and believing will not be pleasant.

If the sun is in the east, one will obtain wealth. If one goes south, the profit will be meager, and one will quickly return to the original place. When going west, one will suddenly gain belief. When going north, one will be as intended, and be happy and free.ğŸ”½ When the sun is in the east, one will be frightened and suffer hardship on the road. If one goes south, one will be at ease. When going west, there will be slight fear. When going north, one will obtain everything sought, and quickly return to the original place.

If one goes east, one will suffer hardship and fear. If one goes south, one will quickly reach the original place, gain profit as intended. If one goes west, all matters will increase, and one will quickly reach the original place. If one goes north, one will gain profit, and quickly return to the original place.
If you go east, you will gain wealth but it will be destroyed. If you go south, it will be satisfactory. If you go west, you will reach your original place. If you go north, you will gain wealth.

If you go east, you will quickly return. If you go south, you will hear pleasant words. If you go west, you will be afraid. If you go north, you will be at peace in your original place and return safely. Your journey will be completed.
At that time, the great assembly again said to the Buddha:
How can we know about thieves in the world?
At that time, the World-Honored One said to the great assembly:
If you want to know about robbery and other matters, you should carefully examine the twelve links of dependent origination.
Good men!

If there is no sun tomorrow, thieves will come from the north and your wealth will be scattered. If they enter your house from the east, the thieves will be very harmful. They will have little hair and live not far away. Within nine days, you will definitely get back your wealth.
If the act link is stolen, the thief's appearance is reddish-yellow, wearing old clothes. If the thief is caught, if he comes from the east, he will clear himself of the matter.
If the consciousness link is stolen, the person comes from his own house, with reddish-yellow hair, and others will hear him speak outside. The stolen property will be recovered.

If the name-and-form link is stolen, the thieves are two brothers, with dark faces and hair. One of them is ugly, with white hair and skilled in crafts. On the twenty-first day, the stolen property will be recovered.

If the six sense bases link is stolen, the thief comes from his own house, with a reddish-yellow complexion, jealous, evil, and large eyes. He comes by a water route and hides the stolen goods near his dwelling place. On the second day, there will be doubt about the loss, and the stolen property is uncertain.

If the contact link is stolen, the thief comes from his own house, tall, with black hair, often coming and happy, foolish, always seeming to cry. If there is a dispute, the stolen property will be recovered.ğŸ”½Here is the corrected and aligned text:
On the day of the receiving link, the thief came from a village. There was one person inside, and the family dog was black. By the 20th day, the thief would definitely be caught.

On the day of the craving link, the thief came from the west, living in a different village. He was tall and people liked seeing him. The family dog had black feet. He argued with people, and when they discussed him, it was definitely not false. On the day of the grasping link, he would be caught.
On the day of the grasping link, the thief came from the south. There was one person arguing inside. When they talked about it, the property would definitely be recovered.
On the day of the becoming link, the thief came from the east. His words were eloquent, but he was crooked and deceitful, and suspicious. He talked about his own relatives.
On the day of the birth link, three people traveled together. Two came from outside, and one was a relative. Search quickly, and the property will be recovered.

The thieves of the stage of old age and death come from the north. Their bodies and heads are all tall and thin, with gaps in their teeth and white heads. On the twenty-fifth day, they will take back your property. After speaking about the thieves,
At that time, the assembly all said to the Buddha,
What does it mean for the eyes to twitch?
The Buddha told the great assembly,
If there are people who want to know about this, they should carefully observe the twelve links of dependent origination and understand the future worries and joys that will definitely not be false.
Furthermore, if a man or woman's left eye twitches in the stage of ignorance, their parents will be alarmed.

If the left eye twitches in the stage of karmic activity, there will be joy that fulfills one's wishes.ğŸ”½If the left eye twitches in the stage of consciousness, the sought-after matters will be in accord with one's intentions.
If the left eye moves in the stage of name and form, one will obtain property.
If the left eye twitches on the day of the stage of the six sense bases, the parents will be displeased.
If the contact link blinks, there will surely be disputes.
If the feeling link blinks, the sought-after matter will be accomplished as intended.
On the day of the craving link, when the left eye blinks, there will be bone and flesh coming.
If the grasping link blinks on its day, all that is sought will be obtained.
If the becoming link blinks, matters of dispute will arise.
If the birth link blinks on its day, one will receive news from afar.
If the aging and death link blinks on its day, all that is sought will be accomplished as intended.
Moreover, if someone observes the twelve links and understands them all,
if the right eye blinks when the ignorance link is present, the parents will be alarmed.
If the right eye blinks when the formations link is present on its day, all matters will be accomplished as intended.
If the right eye blinks when the consciousness link is present on its day, there will be matters of dispute.ğŸ”½Here is the corrected and aligned text:
If the right eye twitches on the day of the name-and-form link, one will obtain new clothes.
If the right eye twitches on the day of the six sense bases link, one's property will be scattered.
If the right eye twitches on the day of the contact link, one will obtain property.
If the right eye twitches on the day of the feeling link, there will be sorrowful crying.ğŸ”½ If the right eye twitches on the day of the craving link, one's property will be slightly scattered.
If the right eye twitches on the day of the grasping link, one will obtain many precious treasures.
If the right eye twitches on the day of the becoming link, one will lose property in a dispute, but will get it back if one seeks it.
If the right eye twitches on the day of the birth link, if one expects someone to come or seeks property, it will definitely come.
If the right eye twitches on the day of the old age and death link, there will be joyful events and harmonious accomplishments.
The twitching of the eyes is finished.
Sutra on the Auspicious Omens of the Twelve Links of Dependent Origination, Scroll 1
